name: You Again
description:
Sometimes, it takes loving someone to find love in yourself.

Play as Ingrid, a writer dealing with the aftermath of a messy breakup. While studying at her local cafe, she slowly learns to love again by daydreaming about the boys near her. This is a story about moving on and self-acceptance.

Made in for the Berklee Video Game Music Jam,  a 48-hour-long game development jam for independent student game developers.

Theme: Déjà vu

Controls:

WASD - Movement

E - Interact

Escape - Menu

Credits:

Coding -   Aidan Strong, Aidan Cini and Evan Charfauros,

Art - Emily Pitcher and Ray Hsiao

Music - Caio M. Jiacomini

Writing - Emily Pitcher
